behaviors.name: spawn_router_simple
behaviors.description: Simple spawn router. Routes workers to critical spawns.

behaviors.name: production_stabilizer
behaviors.description: Stabilizes unit production by preventing over-spawning and managing worker flow without conflicts

behaviors.name: spawn_saturation_clean
behaviors.description: Clean spawn saturation. Routes workers with sufficient energy to nearest critical spawn in priority order (6→2→3→1→4→5). Uses simple greedy distance logic.

behaviors.name: spawn_fill_manager
behaviors.description: Clean spawn filler. Routes workers with energy >= threshold to fill spawns by priority (6→2→3→1→4→5 to 1000 capacity). Simple greedy distance-based routing.

behaviors.name: aggressive_directive_cleanup
behaviors.description: Aggressively removes old harvest directives, keeping only the most recent canonical one to prevent stack pollution.

behaviors.name: spawn_saturation_atomic
behaviors.description: Atomic spawn saturation. Workers with energy>=50% route to nearest critical spawn (6→2→3→1→4→5) to fill to 1000. Simple, conflict-free.
